Class Clues

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • Clues
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Clues
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The class which will show all the clues in the crossword. Shows each direction of clue in a separate list. Allows clues to be selected, causing it's corresponding text entry area to be highlighted in the main crossword.
    Author:
    Daniel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Clues

        public Clues()
        Sets up the two list, containting the across clue and the down clues.

    • Method Detail

      • setCrossWord

        public void setCrossWord(Crossword cross)
        Sets the crossword to use.
        Parameters:
        cross - The given crossword.

      • populate

        public void populate()
        Populates the two lists with the clues. Adds every across clue to the across list and every down clue to the down list.

      • highlightClueAcross

        public void highlightClueAcross(int number)
        Selects and highlights the given clue number.
        Parameters:
        number - The clue number.

      • highlightClueDown

        public void highlightClueDown(int number)
        Selects and highlights the given clue number.
        Parameters:
        number - The clue number.

      • highlightSelected

        public void highlightSelected(Clue selected,
                     int direction)
        Highlights the inputs on the crossword for the given clue.
        Parameters:
        selected - The clue currently selected to be highlighted.
        direction - The direction the clue is in. 1 for across and 2 for down.

      • clearAllSelection

        public void clearAllSelection()
        Deselects any selection in both the across and down clues lists.

      • setMainPanel

        public void setMainPanel(CrossPanel main)
        Sets the panel containing the crossword.
        Parameters:
        main - The crossword panel.
